sudoku.model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstraction of the Sudoku puzzle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int size)
      Create a new board of the given size.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteElement(int row, int col)
      This deletes the element at position row col by setting it back to 0.
      int getElement(int row, int col)
      This method retrieves the element at position row col.
      boolean isSolved()
      This checks if there are any 0's left in the matrix.
      boolean isValid(int row, int col)
      This returns whether the value was a valid insertion.
      void reset()
      This method rests the values in the matrix back to 0;
      void setElement(int row, int col, int num)
      This stores num into the position row col and determines if the insertion is valid.
      int size()
      Return the size of this board.

        public void deleteElement(int row,
                          int col)
        This deletes the element at position row col by setting it back to 0.
        Parameters:
        row - This is the row at which the number would be inserted deleted.
        col - This is the column at which the number would be deleted.

      • getElement

        public int getElement(int row,
                      int col)
        This method retrieves the element at position row col.
        Parameters:
        row - This is the row in the matrix.
        col - This is the column in the matrix.
        Returns:
        Returns the element at the index.

      • setElement

        public void setElement(int row,
                       int col,
                       int num)
        This stores num into the position row col and determines if the insertion is valid.
        Parameters:
        row - This is the row at which the number is inserted.
        col - This is the column at which the number is inserted.
        num - This is the number inserted into the matrix.

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(int row,
                       int col)
        This returns whether the value was a valid insertion.
        Parameters:
        row - This is the row to be checked.
        col - This is the col to be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns the value stored at the index.

      • isSolved

        public boolean isSolved()
        This checks if there are any 0's left in the matrix.
        Returns:
        Returns if there are no 0's left in the matrix.

        This method rests the values in the matrix back to 0;
